note:
• Writer. Blogger. Journalism 𝘢𝘯𝘥 theology degrees, of all things.
• Religious Christian—I don’t shy away from the R-word. Always better than being irreligious.
• I believe in Jesus 𝘢𝘯𝘥 science; I believe in life 𝘢𝘯𝘥 choice. The vigorous pursuit of truth means you ought not fall for false dichotomies.
• I live in the north Bay, but because I work overnights, I publish overnight. (Swap AM for PM, and that’s my life—on Mauritius Time, basically.)
• Question authority: Ask me anything.
